summary: This bill, the Northwest Wetlands Voluntary Incentives Program Act, authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to establish a pilot program to restore habitats for shorebirds, waterfowl, and other wetlands-dependent birds in the Oregon and Washington Coastal Zone and the Columbia River Basin. The program will provide competitive grants and technical assistance to eligible entities for habitat restoration projects, prioritizing projects in areas facing rapid habitat loss and human population growth. The bill outlines eligible project types, criteria for grant awarding, and funding authorization of $10 million annually from 2026-2030.
